channel.title: Forecast on Ruan Pretorius
channel.description: Recent content in Forecast on Ruan Pretorius

item.title: On the naivety of ML models and how to avoid the naive trap
item.description: See original article here The naiveÂ trap When forecasting stock price movements with fancy ML models, you want your models to learn something useful from the provided data that humans might not be aware of so you have a competitive edge. This article will show you examples of where those fancy ML models learn something dumb that looks intelligent and how to check if your models are doing the same.
